segments.text: Hey John , nice skates . Are they new ?
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Yeah , I just got them . I started playing ice hockey in a community league . So , I finally got myself new skates .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: I ’ m a defender . It ’ s a lot of fun . You don ’ t have to be able to skate as fast on defense .
segments.speaker: S2

segments.text: Yeah , you ’ re a pretty big guy . I play goalie , myself .
segments.speaker: S1

segments.text: Really ? I think we play you guys next week . Well , I have to go to practice . See you later .
segments.speaker: S2
